Verses: 1 dhaaveedhu Vaasampannina Nagaramaagiya Ariyele, Ariyele, Aiyo! Varushaavarusham Pandigaigalai Anusariththuvandhaalum,
2 ariyelukku Idukkam Undaakkuven; Appozhudhu Dhukkamum Salippum Undaagum; Adhu Enakku Ariyelaagaththaan Irukkum.
3 unnaip Soozhap Paalayamirangi Unnaith Thetrugalaal Mutrikkaipottu, Unakku Virodhamaaga Koththalangalai Eduppippen.

4 appozhudhu Nee Thaazhththappattuth Tharaiyilirundhu Pesuvaai; Un Pechchup Panindhadhaai Mannilirundhu Purappattu, Un Saththam Anjanam Paarkkiravanudaiya Saththaththaippola Tharaiyilirundhu Munumunuththu, Un Vaakku Mannilirundhu Kasugu Sendru Uraikkum.
5 unmel Varugira Anniyarin Thiral Podiththoolaththanaiyaagavum, Balavandharin Thiral Parakkum Padhar Kalaththanaiyaagavum Irukkum; Adhu Thideerendru Sadidhiyaai Sambavikkum.
6 idigalinaalum, Boomi Adhirchchiyinaalum, Periya Iraichchalinaalum, Perunkaatrinaalum, Pusalinaalum, Patchikkira Akkinijuvaalaiyinaalum, Senaigalinkarththaraale Visaarikkappaduvaai.

7 ariyelinmel Yuththampannugira Thiralaana Sagala Jaadhigalum, Adhinmelum Adhin Aranmelum Yuththampanni, Adharku Idukkan Seygira Anaivarum Raakkaalaththarisanamaagiya Soppanaththaik Kaangiravargalukku Oppaayiruppaargal.

8 adhu, Pasiyaayirukkiravan Thaan Pusikkiradhaaga Soppanam Kandum, Vizhikkumpodhu Avan Verumaiyaayirukkiradhupolavum, Thaagamaayirukkiravan, Thaan Kudikkiradhaaga Soppanam Kandum, Vizhikkumpodhu Avan Vidaaiththu Thavanaththodirukkiradhupolavum Seeyon Malaikku Virodhamaaga Yuththampannugira Thiralaana Sagala Jaadhigalum Irukkum.
9 thariththunindru Thigaiyungal; Bramiththuk Kooppidungal; Veruththirukkiraargal, Dhraatcharasaththinaal Alla; Thallaadugiraargal Madhubaanaththinaal Alla.
10 karththar Ungalmel Kananiththiraiyin Aaviyai Varappanni, Ungal Kangalai Adaiththu, Gnaanadhrushtikkaararaagiya Ungal Theerkkadharisigalukkum Thalaivargalukkum Mukkaadupottaar.

11 aadhalaal Dharisanamellaam Ungalukku Muththirikkappatta Pusthagaththin Vasanangalaippolirukkum; Vaasikka Arindhirukkira Oruvanukku Adhaik Koduththu: Nee Idhai Vaasi Endraal, Avan Idhu Ennaal Koodaadhu, Idhu Muththiriththirukkiradhu Enbaan,
12 alladhu Vaasikkath Theriyaadhavanidaththil Pusthagaththaik Koduththu: Nee Idhai Vaasi Endraal, Avan Enakku Vaasikkath Theriyaadhu Enbaan

13 indha Janangal Thangal Vaayinaal Ennidaththil Serndhu, Thangal Udhadugalinaal Ennaik Ganampannugiraargal; Avargal Irudhayamo Enakku Dhooramaai Vilagiyirukkiradhu; Avargal Enakku Bayappadugira Bayam Manusharaale Podhikkappatta Karpanaiyaayirukkiradhu.

14 aadhalaal Idho, Naan Arpudhamum Aachchariyamumaana Pragaaramaaga Indha Janangalukkulle Oru Adhisayaththai Seyven; Avargaludaiya Gnaanigalin Gnaanam Kettu, Avargaludaiya Vivegigalin Vivegam Marandhupogum Endru Aandavar Sollugiraar.

15 thangal Aalosanaiyaik Karththarukku Maraikkumpadikku Maraividangalil Oliththu, Thangal Kiriyaigalai Andhagaaraththil Nadappiththu: Nammaik Kaangiravar Yaar? Nammai Arigiravar Yaar Engiravargalukku Aiyo!

16 aa, Neengal Evvalavu Maarupaadullavargal! Kuyavan Kalimannukku Samaanamaaga Ennappadalaamo? Undaakkappattadhu Thannai Undaakkinavaraikkuriththu: Avar Ennai Undaakkinadhillai Endrum; Uruvaakkappattadhu Thannai Uruvaakkinavaraikkuriththu: Avarukku Buththiyillai Endrum Sollaththagumo?
17 innum Konjak Kaalaththilallavo Leebanon Sezhippaana Vayalveliyaaga Maarum; Sezhippaana Vayalveli Kaadaaga Ennappadum.
18 akkaalaththile Sevidar Pusthagaththin Vasanangalaik Ketpaargal; Kurudarin Kangal Irulukkum Andhagaaraththukkum Neengalaagip Paarvaiyadaiyum.
19 sirumaiyaanavargal Karththarukkul Migavum Magizhndhu, Manusharil Elimaiyaanavargal Isravelin Parisuththarukkul Kalikooruvaargal.
20 kodiyan Atruppovaan, Sakkandhakkaaran Illaamarpovaan.

21 oru Vaarththaiyinimiththam Manushanaik Kutrappaduththi, Nyaayavaasalil Thangalaik Kadindhukollugiravanukkuk Kannivaiththu, Needhimaanai Nirnimiththamaaith Thuraththi, Ippadi Akkiramancheyya Vagaithedugira Yaavarum Sangarikkappaduvaargal.
22 aagaiyaal, Aabiragaamai Meettukkonda Karththar Yaakkobin Vamsaththaik Kuriththu: Ini Yaakkobu Vetkappaduvadhillai; Ini Avan Mugam Seththuppovadhumillai.

23 avan En Karangalin Seyalaagiya Than Pillaigalai Than Naduvile Kaanumpodhu, En Naamaththaip Parisuththappaduththuvaargal; Yaakkobin Parisuththarai Avargal Parisuththappaduththi, Isravelin Dhevanukku Bayappaduvaargal.
24 vazhuvippogira Manadhai Udaiyavargal Buththimaangalaagi, Murumurukkiravargal Ubadhesam Katrukkolluvaargal.
